_header: There rede such life thou forsake
Note: Follows 5911 with only one Latin couplet between.
Subjects: sermons, verse in; precepts; aphorisms; death
_description: On death following in same manner as one has lived, in a Latin sermon — one couplet

Lincoln44.Transcription:
Þer rede suche life þu for sakewith suche deþ last
                    þu be take
